name: Flappy Bee (itch) (AndalinaGameDev)
description:
If you gotta fly you gotta fly!!

Welcome to Flappy Bee!

Simply tap or click on the screen to keep the little Bee in the air (jump). Try to avoid obstacles and piranha plants.  Warning: The game starts immediately as soon as you press Play from the Menu, make sure to tap or click immediately and keep the bee flying (this should be a good fix in future updates).

The game level is infinite (endless), it will only stop when you collide with any of the obstacles. The goal is to aim for a HighScore.

Level difficulty increases slightly for every 20 points (obstacles passed).

The game is linked to the Google Play Store, but it is currently unavailable since it is under Review - it will be published within a couple of days from today.

** Updates will be available depending on the feedbacks.

Enjoy!
